forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 17C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 62F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this evening with showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 65F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Slight chance of a shower late. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Slight chance of a shower late. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with occasional rain. High 58F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 10C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 16C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 62F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 16C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low 44F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 17C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 62F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 43F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 18C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High around 65F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low around 45F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 67F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
